Package no.hiof.webframework.repository

Class RepositoryConnection

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.webframework.repository.RepositoryConnection
Direct Known Subclasses:
RepositoryConnectionHandler, TestRepositoryConnection
public abstract class RepositoryConnection extends Object
An abstract class that represents a connection to a repository or database.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect()
      Establishes a connection to the database using the provided credentials.

    • connect

      public void connect(String schemaName)
      Establishes a connection to the database with the specified schema name.
      Parameters:
      schemaName - name of the specified schema to connect to.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Closes the database connection.

    • createConnection

      protected abstract Connection createConnection()
      An abstract method that needs to be implemented by the subclasses. It creates and returns a 'Connection' object specific to the database being used.
      Returns:
      Connection object

    • createConnection

      protected abstract Connection createConnection(String schemaName)
      An abstract method that needs to be implemented by the subclasses. It creates and returns a 'Connection' object specified to the database and schema being used.
      Parameters:
      schemaName - schema to connect to
      Returns:
      Connection object
